Package org.daisy.dotify.hyphenator.impl

Class LatexHyphenatorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.dotify.hyphenator.impl.LatexHyphenatorFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HyphenatorFactory
    public class LatexHyphenatorFactory
extends Object
implements HyphenatorFactory
    Provides a hyphenator factory that uses latex hyphenation rules.

        Returns a new hyphenator configured for the specified locale.
        Specified by:
        newHyphenator in interface HyphenatorFactory
        Parameters:
        locale - a valid locale for the new hyphenator, as defined by IETF RFC 3066
        Returns:

        Throws:
        HyphenatorConfigurationException - if the locale is not supported
